DOC.brief_summary: Observational, short-term prospective, multicenter study to assess psychometric properties of the Spanish version of SWN-K scale in patients with schizophrenia.
DOC.brief_title: Validity of the Spanish Version of Subjective Well-being Under Neuroleptics Scale (SWN-K) in Patients With Schizophrenia
DOC.criteria: Patients with a diagnosis of schizophrenia, schizoaffective disorder, or schizophreniform disorder (DSMIV TR criteria) Stabilized outpatients Under treatment with an oral antipsychotic drug Administration of a depot antipsychotic drug Participation in another clinical trial within 4 weeks prior to enrolment into this study
